fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Ooze** (3 uses): You can visit a player each night, covering them in your slimy ooze. The next day, their vote will count as 0 and they will be unable to be lynched. This effect lasts for two days.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Ooze** becomes **Contagious Ooze**: When you use Ooze on a player, the effect spreads to one additional random player. The additional player will also have their vote count as 0 and be immune to lynching for two days.
- **Blob Split**: If you are attacked and survive, you will split into two Squishies with the same attributes and abilities. Both Squishies can use Ooze independently. This splitting can only occur once per game.
